entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
